by road, by bus no 44A, 44D, 44C, By auto rikshaw Rs.200, by Taxi Rs.300, by train ( at the Ullal Station) 2 km from the city center.

value: Several hindu temples especially during a festival,
Replica of an ancient arab dhow under construction at the riverside boatyard forever. Looks like Noah's ark

Trip to the  bar  (where the two rivers Nethravathi & Gurpur meet). Here we are on a tongue of  land with the sea on one side, the river on the other side with Mangalore city beyond,  and the  Western Ghats as a back drop.
Lime kilns, dry fish & fish oil extraction at Kotepura.
Visit the orphanage with handicrafts center (cutwork embroidery) and old age home at the   Nirmala Social welfare center.
Adoption services at the Nirmala Social welfare center. Ph 2465692
Eco-trips  for experiencing nature, photography or painting / drawing along the coast, rivers, lagoons,  backwaters or  the countryside.
Cashew research Center at Thokottu 2 km away ph : 2466249 8AM-5PM, sat 8AM-1PM.
Swim in the swimming pool at Summer Sands or in the sea,
Take a boat ride on River Netravati,
Walk along the eroding sea coast
Walk and shop along ancient Ferry Road
Cycling (hiring of cycles available in the local village)  along the country side & along the back  waters &  lagoons.

Cycle hire Mr. Roff 2462374, Bike Hire Mr. Praveen 2430288

value: Boating in the rivers, back waters & lagoons.
Sailing or canoeing in the river in the local dug out boats.
Cockle picking off the river bed at the Islands in the river.
Picnic to islands in the river / moon lit picnic to the islands.
A  sojourn  with  the fishermen on  their  fishing trips in the sea (sometimes at night) / Shark  fishing.
Picnic to  the  Someshwara Rock, and Temple  (2km. along the beach to the south of Summer  Sands Beach resort).
Insect repellent to save yourself from mosquito bites
